Description: Limestone ostracon with illegable traces of text on the recto and remains of 10 lines of text on the verso containing an administrative document.
Bibliographic references: Biedenkopf-Ziehner 2000a / Koptische Ostraka I: Ostraka aus dem Britischen Museum in London (335-336, pl. 51)
Delattre 2002 / CR de O.Brit.Mus.Copt. II et O.Ashm.Copt. (p.332)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (82916) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/82916)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. II Ad 3 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
